body.name: Arganatural Tightening Retinol Body Lotion 480ml
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 50 mins
features: ANTI-CELLULITE BODY LOTION: Concentrated blend of Retinol, Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid targets problem areas by thickening and plumping the dermis to create a smooth, dimple-free appearance

FIRMS & TIGHTENS: Noticeably tightens skin and helps boosts elasticity while fighting the look of cellulite on hips, abdomen, thighs and buttocks; Stimulates natural collagen production for a more toned and contoured silhouette
NEW & IMPROVED FORMULA: Our thicker, creamier, antioxidant-rich formula plumps the look of aging skin; Deeply hydrates and softens without feeling greasy or sticky
HOW TO USE: Apply a generous amount all over the entire body; For best results, apply an extra layer to problem areas; Reapply as needed throughout the day.
CLEAN BEAUTY: Formulated with natural vitamins, minerals, superfoods and antioxidants without the use of harsh chemicals or parabens; Cruelty free; Made in the USA
body.description: Arganatural Tightening Body Lotion with Retinol, Caffeine & Hyaluronic - Helps Tighten & Nourish Aging Skin, Normal to Cellulite Prone Skin, for all Skin Types, 480ml

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin feels amazing - pump does not work
reviews.reviewText: LOVE! I have terrible skin - it’s oily, dry, crepey, saggy, wrinkly - you name it… but this is moisturizing and makes it super soft to the touch and it just feels good to live in. I hate most lotions, they seem tacky, sink in without accomplishing anything, feel oily… but this isn’t any of those! It’s not heavy, my skin drinks it up and it only feels a little oily for an hour or so if I put too much on… which I do sometimes bc I like to bathe in it! My hands are even awesome - it’s winter and I wash them a lot and they are always dry to the point they are rough and almost cracking… not now - my body feels like silk!!!! Made my husband feel my dry legs and now he is stealing my lotion. But the pun doesn’t work… I’d like to find a good pump for it - or even a squirt top… it’s annoying to have to unscrew the pump, pull the pump out of the bottle then screw it back in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion has vital ingredients for the skin. It's easy to apply and lightly scented and smells great. It's a good addition to my skin routine. My skin is looking refreshed and plump after two weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good lotion
reviews.reviewText: It took awhile to receive my order. I really like the lotion and hope it works. The negative is the pump will not open. I don't want to return the entire bottle, just want a pump that works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is great, pump no so much
reviews.reviewText: Love this lotion! So hydrating and soft sent. But the dispenser pump is defective

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: Love this moisturizer! Lovely scent and the pump gives you the perfect amount so you're not constantly pumping! It's a nice light lotion that goes on smoothly and not greasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing!! As I’m now in my early 40s, I am very focused on keeping my skin nourished! This product is amazing and I love the ingredients and that it isn’t full of toxic chemicals! Highly recommend! Leaves your skin feeling soft, supple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived with a defective pump so the lotion could not be dispensed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lotion if fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: I was going to return this product because the pump was delivered broken. I tried the product that I loved it so much I couldn’t stop using it to return it.
